name: CoStar
description:
CoStar

This game was created in 48 hours for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.

You’ve been invited to a sweet alien house party and this party is getting OUT OF CONTROL. The only problem is you’re a bit of a wallflower. Try to get your cup onto the coaster without bumping into any of the party guests, but be cautious. As the night goes on, the other aliens at the party start to get more and more OUT OF CONTROL… and less worried about personal space.

The original concept of the game was that you’d have an arm connected to your hand and you wouldn’t be able to control the arm. Obstacles would be able to push and pull the arm while you tried to reach the end of the level and each level would become more erratic. Unfortunately, this is our very first game and we ran out of time while trying to figure out how we would do that. We’re still very proud of what we managed to accomplish with little to no experience in programming.

Controls

Left/Right ------ Mouse

Forward -------- Mouse Left Click

Drop Cup ------- Mouse Right Click

Space ------------ Restart

 

Thank you so much for playing our very first game.

Love,

LaddLabs

Noah Dohanich, Lukas Gerlach, Serena Olsen
